title: 【原版命令方块】[OOC]  特殊弓箭（娱乐向）
author: qq1059379207
txt_content:
本帖最后由 qq1059379207 于 2017-7-3 18:56 编辑 

PS：偏熊

无聊随便做的，玩玩就好，别太认真了


要停止的话只需要将，这个紫色方块里的“保持开启”改为“红石控制” 就行啦~~

代码:
/summon FallingSand ~ ~1 ~ {Block:stone,Time:1,Passengers:[{id:FallingSand,Block:redstone_block,Time:1,Passengers:[{id:FallingSand,Block:activator_rail,Time:1,Passengers:[{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:gamerule commandBlockOutput false},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:fill ~2 ~-3 ~-2 ~7 ~ ~3 purpur_block 0 hollow},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:fill ~2 ~-2 ~-2 ~7 ~-1 ~3 stained_glass 9 0 purpur_block},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:fill ~3 ~-2 ~-1 ~6 ~-1 ~2 chain_command_block 5},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:fill ~6 ~-1 ~1 ~5 ~-1 ~1 chain_command_block 4},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:setblock ~6 ~-1 ~2 chain_command_block 2},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:setblock ~3 ~-2 ~2 chain_command_block 1},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:fill ~6 ~-2 ~2 ~4 ~-2 ~2 chain_command_block 4},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:setblock ~6 ~-2 ~1 chain_command_block 3},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:setblock ~3 ~-2 ~ chain_command_block 3},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:fill ~6 ~-2 ~ ~4 ~-2 ~ chain_command_block 4},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:setblock ~6 ~-2 ~-1 chain_command_block 3},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:setblock ~3 ~-2 ~-1 repeating_command_block 5},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:blockdata ~5 ~-1 ~1 {auto:1,Command:"/setblock ~-4 ~ ~1 wall_sign 4 replace {ench:[{id:51,lvl:0}],display:{Name:\\\\\\\\\\\\\\"雷霆\\\\\\\\\\\\\\",Lore:[\\\\\\\\\\\\\\"特殊技能：雷击\\\\\\\\\\\\\\"]},HideFlags:1}\\\\\\"},\\\\\\"extra\\\\\\":[\\\\\\"\\\\\\"]}\\",Text2:\\"{\\\\\\"text\\\\\\":\\\\\\"雷霆之弓\\\\\\",\\\\\\"bold\\\\\\":\\\\\\"true\\\\\\",\\\\\\"italic\\\\\\":\\\\\\"true\\\\\\",\\\\\\"color\\\\\\":\\\\\\"blue\\\\\\",\\\\\\"extra\\\\\\":[\\\\\\"\\\\\\"]}\\",Text3:\\"{\\\\\\"text\\\\\\":\\\\\\"\\\\\\",\\\\\\"extra\\\\\\":[\\\\\\"\\\\\\"]}\\",Text4:\\"{\\\\\\"text\\\\\\":\\\\\\"\\\\\\",\\\\\\"extra\\\\\\":[\\\\\\"\\\\\\"]}\\",facing:\\"west\\"}"}},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:blockdata ~4 ~-1 ~2 {auto:1,Command:scoreboard players reset * G}},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:blockdata ~3 ~-1 ~2 {auto:1,Command:kill @e[score_kill=1,score_kill_min=1,type=Arrow]}},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:blockdata ~3 ~-2 ~2 {auto:1,Command:scoreboard objectives add kill dummy}},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:blockdata ~4 ~-2 ~2 {auto:1,Command:scoreboard objectives add G dummy}},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:blockdata ~5 ~-2 ~2 {auto:1,Command:execute @a[score_G=4,score_G_min=4] ~ ~ ~ /execute @e[score_G=4,score_G_min=4,type=Arrow] ~ ~ ~ particle portal ~ ~ ~ 1.5 1.5 1.5 0.200 10000}},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:blockdata ~6 ~-2 ~2 {auto:1,Command:execute @a[score_G=4,score_G_min=4] ~ ~ ~ /execute @e[score_G=4,score_G_min=4,type=Arrow] ~ ~ ~ /tp @p @e[type=Arrow]}},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:blockdata ~6 ~-2 ~1 {auto:1,Command:execute @a[score_G=1,score_G_min=1] ~ ~ ~ /execute @e[type=PrimedTnt] ~ ~ ~ /summon LightningBolt ~ ~ ~}},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:blockdata ~5 ~-2 ~1 {auto:1,Command:execute @a[score_G=2,score_G_min=2] ~ ~ ~ /execute @e[score_G=2,score_G_min=2,type=Arrow] ~ ~ ~ summon FallingSand ~ ~1 ~ {Block:fire,Time:1}}},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:blockdata ~4 ~-2 ~1 {auto:1,Command:execute @a[score_G=2,score_G_min=2] ~ ~ ~ /execute @e[score_G=3,score_G_min=3,type=Arrow] ~ ~ ~ summon PrimedTnt ~ ~ ~ {Fus:1}}},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:blockdata ~3 ~-2 ~1 {auto:1,Command:execute @a[score_G=1,score_G_min=1] ~ ~ ~ /execute @e[score_G=1,score_G_min=1,type=Arrow] ~ ~ ~ summon PrimedTnt ~ ~ ~ {Fuse:1}}},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:blockdata ~3 ~-2 ~ {auto:1,Command:execute @a[score_G=4,score_G_min=4] ~ ~ ~ /scoreboard players set @e[type=Arrow] G 4 {inGround:1b}}},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:blockdata ~4 ~-2 ~ {auto:1,Command:execute @a[score_G=2,score_G_min=2] ~ ~ ~ /scoreboard players set @e[type=Arrow] G 3 {inGround:1b}}},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:blockdata ~5 ~-2 ~ {auto:1,Command:execute @a[score_G=2,score_G_min=2] ~ ~ ~ /scoreboard players set @e[type=Arrow] G 2}},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:blockdata ~6 ~-2 ~ {auto:1,Command:execute @a[score_G_min=1] ~ ~ ~ /scoreboard players set @e[type=Arrow] kill 1 {inGround:1b}}},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:blockdata ~6 ~-2 ~-1 {auto:1,Command:"scoreboard players set @p G 2 {SelectedItem:{id:minecraft:bow,tag:{ench:[{id:51,lvl:0}],display:{Name:\\"火凤凰\\",Lore:[\\"特殊技能：走过之路必有火\\"]},HideFlags:1}}}"}},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:blockdata ~5 ~-2 ~-1 {auto:1,Command:"scoreboard players set @p G 4 {SelectedItem:{id:minecraft:bow,tag:{ench:[{id:51,lvl:0}],display:{Name:\\"末影\\",Lore:[\\"特殊技能：传送\\"]},HideFlags:1}}}"}},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:blockdata ~4 ~-2 ~-1 {auto:1,Command:execute @a[score_G=1,score_G_min=1] ~ ~ ~ /scoreboard players set @e[type=Arrow] G 1 {inGround:1b}}},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:blockdata ~3 ~-2 ~-1 {auto:1,Command:"scoreboard players set @p G 1 {SelectedItem:{id:minecraft:bow,tag:{ench:[{id:51,lvl:0}],display:{Name:\\"雷霆\\",Lore:[\\"特殊技能：雷击\\"]},HideFlags:1}}}"}},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:setblock ~ ~ ~1 command_block 0 0 {Command:fill ~ ~-3 ~-1 ~ ~ ~ air}},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:setblock ~ ~-1 ~1 redstone_block},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:kill @e[type=MinecartCommandBlock,r=1]}]}]}]}复制代码
